title: SnapDock — Markdown Workspace
description: A clean, fast, distraction-free Markdown reader with file-tree navigation, multi-file viewing, and a polished ZetoLabs UI. Designed for writers, developers, and students who want a simple, elegant workspace.

features.title: File-Tree Navigation
features.description: Browse entire folders of Markdown files with a clean, responsive sidebar.

features.title: Multi-File Viewing
features.description: Open multiple documents at once and switch between them instantly.

features.title: Drag-and-Drop Support
features.description: Drop files or folders directly into SnapDock to load them instantly.

features.title: PDF Export (Planned)
features.description: Export Markdown documents to polished PDFs with one click.

engineeringNotes: SnapDock focuses on simplicity and clarity. No plugins, no clutter — just a clean Markdown workspace. Built with Electron for cross-platform support and Tailwind for a consistent ZetoLabs aesthetic.

title: ZIA — Modular AI Assistant Framework
description: A proof-of-concept modular AI assistant that connects Slack, Discord, and a web interface to local or external AI models. Built to explore persona switching, persistent memory, and multi‑platform routing.

features.title: Slack & Discord Handlers
features.description: Unified message routing across multiple chat platforms.

features.title: Persona Templates
features.description: Switch between conversation styles using JSON-based persona configs.

features.title: Persistent Memory
features.description: Per-channel JSON memory storage with no database required.

features.title: Config-Driven Setup
features.description: All behavior controlled through JSON files — no code edits needed.

engineeringNotes: ZIA is intentionally raw — a prototype that laid the groundwork for ZetoAI. It demonstrates routing, persona switching, and memory, but is not intended as a polished product.

title: NestKey — Secure Password Vault
description: A privacy-focused, offline password vault designed for local-first credential storage. No cloud, no telemetry — just encrypted, auditable security.

features.title: Local-Only Storage
features.description: All credentials stored offline. No cloud servers, no sync.

features.title: AES-256 Encryption
features.description: Industry-standard encryption for all vault data.

features.title: Master Password + Biometrics
features.description: Unlock your vault with a single password or OS-level biometrics.

features.title: Auto-Fill (Planned)
features.description: Browser extension for seamless login workflows.

engineeringNotes: Rust handles all cryptographic operations for maximum safety. SQLite provides a lightweight, local-first storage engine. Designed to be fully auditable and transparent.

title: Thronebound — Action RPG Prototype
description: A dark-fantasy action RPG prototype exploring combat feel, worldbuilding, and interactive narrative systems. Built as a long-term creative project.

features.title: Real-Time Combat
features.description: Fast, responsive combat with combos, dodges, and enemy AI.

features.title: Procedural Environments
features.description: Hand-crafted worlds enhanced with procedural generation.

features.title: Branching Narrative
features.description: Player choices influence story direction and world state.

features.title: Skill Trees
features.description: Deep progression with interconnected abilities.

engineeringNotes: Focused on combat feel and player agency. Built in UE5 to explore next-gen rendering and gameplay systems.

title: Networking & Systems — ZetoLabs Infrastructure
description: The homelab and internal infrastructure powering ZetoLabs: DNS, VPN, Kubernetes, monitoring, and automation.

features.title: Kubernetes Cluster
features.description: Self-hosted cluster for containerized workloads.

features.title: DNS & Security
features.description: PiHole filtering, WireGuard VPN, and zero-trust networking.

features.title: Infrastructure as Code
features.description: Terraform + Ansible for reproducible deployments.

features.title: Monitoring Stack
features.description: Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK for metrics and logs.

engineeringNotes: Designed for reliability and disaster recovery. All infrastructure is version-controlled and automated.
